text:
Try to load an SVG file from a path that contains a '#', you will get a file 
not found exception (example: "C:/my documents/bug #284/sample/hello.svg")
The error is coming from org.apache.batik.bridge.DocumentLoader.loadDocument
(String uri) 

the code 
  if (n != -1)
should be replaced by something like
  if ((n != -1) && ((uri.lastIndexOf('\\') < n) || (uri.lastIndexOf('/') < n)))
though it would still not work if the file name itself contains a '#'.
creator: pconverset@qarbon.com
